title: Basic cheesecake
ingredients: ['90g digestive biscuit crumbs', '4 tablespoons finely chopped walnuts', '3 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '5 tablespoons butter, melted', '675g cream cheese', '200g caster sugar', '250ml soured cream', '250ml double cream', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 eggs']
